jobDescription: Prime Inc. was founded in 1970 by Robert Low and is North America's most successful refrigerated, flatbed, and tanker trucking company and provides safe, reliable, and continuous on-time service to its expanding international customer base. We are hiring for experienced and non-experienced drivers in refrigerated, flatbed, and tanker. How To Get Started: Attend a 3-day orientation at Prime in one of the following locations: Springfield, MO; Pittston, PA; and Salt Lake City, UT. Prime provides bus transportation to orientation as well as 3 meals per day and hotel accommodations during orientation. Experience hands-on, computer based, and simulator training.
